text: Has anyone run into an issue where you can’t publish a global header because of errors on the template? I’m getting 2 errors, one on a menu module and another a linked image module - however the syntax in both of these modules is correct. Does anyone have any insights here?
Seems LIKE there might be a systemic issue in HubSpot at the moment. many people are complaining about the same thing
ok didn’t know if it was just me
<@U2LEJ045D> We are very close to deploying a fix for this. Thank you for your patience on this issue
The fix has been deployed. If any of you have a second to confirm on your end that would be great
<@U22PNRAJD> - I'll get in there and test it.
<@U22PNRAJD> - I just tested it and things seem to be working correctly again. Thanks again
How does HS handle a 403 and 401 server error? I know we can't set these pages but I was curious if something was set already for default?

Can anyone help me on thins? I need to delete/remove the default check boxes coming in the Subscription preference page
here is my link : <https://preview.hs-sites.com/_hcms/preview/template/multi?is_buffered_template_layout=true&portalId=1598194&tc_deviceCategory=desktop&template_layout_id=5864429756>
